resources.string: This app allow you interact with a common error in eventual connectivity.
The antipattern Nonexistent Result Notification will be show here.
Nonexistent notification of progress while downloading content
Nonexistent notification of an issue while downloading content
Nonexistent notification for an action performed successfully
Nonexistent notification Â of problem when performing an action
Nonexistent notification of a process being executed in background
Nonexistent notification of retrying an action
The app does not show anything indicating that the required content is being downloaded. It seems that nothing happened.
The app does not show anything indicating that the required content could not be downloaded. It seems that nothing happened.
The app does not show any result or message indicating that the action carried out by the user was performed successfully. It seems that nothing happened.
The app does not show any result or message indicating that the action carried out by the user was not performed successfully because of a connectivity problem . It seems that nothing happened.
The app does not show any message that indicates that a process is being executed in background. It seems that nothing happened.
The app does not show any message that indicates that the user should retrying the action.
